title: change of email
body:
Hey guys im trying to change an accounts email, I've filled in the part where u change it but the (submit) button isn't doing anything and I also tried too on mine and my brothers account same deal 

The submit button is a real dim grey like maybe ive done somthing wrong and not able to press it yet but I filled in all the infomation in all the fields but still not able to press it

Also im at work and trying to do it of my mobile device and sometimes things in web pages just dont work so ill try it when i get home but I thought to try get some answers now incase I get the same deal on my PC cheers for reading would appreciate some help thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Did this work when you tested it on your actual computer?
